data.chText: 上个季度对我来说是一次学习。
data.enText: Last season was a learning experience for me.
knowledge that you get from reading and studying

data.chText: 他在学西班牙语 / 游泳。

data.enText: She studied chemistry for three years.

data.chText: 本节课我们将复习上周所学的内容。
data.enText: In this class we’ll revise/review what we did last week.

data.chText: 只要你练习说英语，很快就会进步。
data.enText: If you practise speaking English, you’ll soon improve.

data.chText: 我们只有两周时间排练此剧。
data.enText: We only had two weeks to rehearse the play.

ex.chText: 这位老人非常了解北京。
ex.enText: The old man has a good knowledge of Beijing.

ex.chText: 一知半解是很危险的事。
ex.enText: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

synonyms.bx: 指对全部已知或可知的知识的理解。

ex.enText: He made a display of his learning.

ex.chText: 她是个学识渊博的女子。
ex.enText: She is a woman of great learning.

synonyms.bx: 指通过研究、总结经验或他人传授而得到的知识。

ex.chText: 这无疑是一部学术巨著。
ex.enText: This is undoubtedly a magnificent work of scholarship.

synonyms.bx: 尤指经过深入学习、研究而获得的渊博的、严谨的知识。

tr: the cognitive process of acquiring skill or knowledge

value.def: Learning is the process of gaining knowledge through studying.

example.ex: The brochure described the library as the focal point of learning on the campus.
example.tran: 这本小册子把图书馆形容为校园学习的中心。
